history.proof: intros a b c H1 H2. hauto lq: on use: Z.mul_divide_cancel_r, Z.mul_comm.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H1 : c <> 0 H2 : (c * a | c * b) Unable to unify "(c * a | c * b)" with "(Z.abs a | c * b)".

original: intros a b c H1 H2. apply divide_trans with (b:=c * a). - apply divide_trans with (b:=c * b). + apply Zdivide_Zabs_l. apply H2. + apply Z.divide_div; try auto. - apply Gauss; try auto. + apply Zdivide_Zabs_inv_l. apply H1. + apply Zdivide_opp_r. apply Zdivide_opp_l_rev with (b:=c). apply divide_sum with (b:= -b). * apply divide_trans with (b:=a). apply divide_sum with (b := b); auto. * apply Zdivide_mod_minus with (a:=0). split. ++ apply Z.divide_div; try auto. ++ eauto. - apply not_divide1; eauto.
